tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to the Python and Database scripting workshop.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: Install python-oracledb driver and test connection to the Autonomous Database

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Connection Pools
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb connection pools to connect to the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Fetching Data
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb connection pools to fetch data from the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Binding Data
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to bind data from the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab 6: PL/SQL
tutorials.description: Use PL/SQL procedures and functions to access data stored in Oracle databases

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Type Handlers
tutorials.description: Use type handlers to alter data fetched or sent to the Oracle database using the python-oracledb

tutorials.title: Lab 8: LOBS
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to manipulate LOBs in Oracle databases

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Rowfactory Functions
tutorials.description: Use python-oracledb to enable queries to return objects other than tuples

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Subclassing Connections and Cursors
tutorials.description: Use subclassing for hooking connection and cursor creation with python-oracledb

tutorials.title: Lab: Terminate Oracle Autonomous Database
tutorials.description: Terminating an Oracle Autonomous Database permanently

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
